name: Deep Space Survival - Keycard Edition
description: Solo survival scenario. Escape the station by finding keys and access codes.

locations.name: Cryo Bay
locations.description: A cold, frost-covered room. Emergency lights flicker.

locations.name: Main Corridor
locations.description: A long hallway connecting the ship's sectors.

locations.name: Engineering
locations.description: Humming with machinery. A secure locker sits against the wall.

locations.name: Command Bridge
locations.description: The command center. A distress beacon console dominates the center.

objects.name: Dead Technician
objects.description: A crew member in a technician's uniform. He clutches something in his hand.

objects.name: Security Keycard
objects.description: A blue keycard with 'Level 1 Access' printed on it.
objects.mechanics: Used to verify identity. Required to access certain locked areas or terminals.

objects.name: Log Terminal
objects.description: A glowing green screen displaying the last entry.
objects.mechanics: Read-only. Display reads: 'Locker code reset to 7734 due to memory error.'

objects.name: Secure Locker
objects.description: A heavy metal locker with a keypad.
objects.mechanics: LOCKED. Requires 4-digit PIN code to open. If correct code (7734) is provided in interaction, state becomes 'open'. Contains 'Override Disk'.

objects.name: Override Disk
objects.description: A red data disk labeled 'EMERGENCY OVERRIDE'.

objects.name: Distress Beacon Console
objects.description: Main communication array. Screen says 'SYSTEM LOCKED - INSERT OVERRIDE DISK'.
objects.mechanics: Needs 'Override Disk' inserted to function. If disk is used/inserted, state becomes 'online' and message sent.

agents.name: Alice
agents.background: Woke up alone. Needs to escape.
agents.initial_goal: Find a way to signal for rescue.
